name: International Karate Defence
description:
International Karate Defence is a small project I worked on a while ago.

I was recently at a video game festival called GameCity and as there was room I just put my laptop in the mix with this game running.

It became quite popular and it was suggested I upload it to here.

It is free to download but if you could pay a little that would be nice.

I stopped working on this such a long time ago that if I were to work on it again I would start a new with a story and what not.

it was originally made for an arcade machine so here are the buttons you will need.

The arrow keys (directions)

Space Bar (select and top defend)

B (only needed in the info section to get back to the title screen)

Esc (exit)

Thank you for reading
